sense.gloss: (feeling) impatient, irritated, irritating, frustrated, frustrating, vexed, vexing
being frustrated because something is not quite as hoped (just as one cannot scratch an itch from outside a shoe), having an itch that one cannot scratch
delicate situation, choice of two evils, mixed blessing
things happening exactly as one pleases (wishes), someone being very attentive to one's wishes
to complain of itching, to be bothered by an itch (or rash, etc.), to feel itchy, to have an itch (or rash, etc.), to itch

sdata.j: もっと↑単刀直入↑↓たんとうちょくにゅう↓に↑言↑↓い↓ってくれないかな。↑隔靴掻痒↑↓かっかそうよう↓の↑感↑↓かん↓なきにしもあらずだよ。
sdata.e: You don't have to leave me hanging like this. Why don't you just come out and tell it to me straight?

sdata.j: ↑痛↑↓いた↓くも↑痒↑↓かゆ↓くもない。
sdata.e: Don't care a hang about it.

sdata.j: ↑蚊↑↓か↓に↑刺↑↓さ↓されて↑痒↑↓かゆ↓いよ。↑何↑↓なに↓か↑薬↑↓くすり↓↑持↑↓も↓ってない？
sdata.e: I'm itchy from mosquito bites. Do you have something for it?

sdata.j: パイナップルはダメなんだ。↑食↑↓た↓べると↑口↑↓くち↓の↑中↑↓なか↓が↑痒↑↓かゆ↓くなっちゃうんだよ。
sdata.e: Pineapples are no good. When I eat them, the inside of my mouth gets itchy.

sdata.j: パイナップルはダメなんだ。↑食↑↓た↓べると↑口↑↓くち↓の↑中↑↓なか↓が↑痒↑↓かゆ↓くなっちゃうんだよ。
sdata.e: I can't eat pineapple. When I do, my mouth gets itchy.

sdata.j: ↑結膜炎↑↓けつまくえん↓のせいで↑目↑↓め↓が↑痒↑↓かゆ↓い。
sdata.e: My eyes are itching because of conjunctivitis.

sdata.j: ↑蚊↑↓か↓に↑噛↑↓か↓まれたところが↑痒↑↓かゆ↓い。

words.gloss: (feeling) impatient, irritated, irritating, frustrated, frustrating, vexed, vexing
being frustrated because something is not quite as hoped (just as one cannot scratch an itch from outside a shoe), having an itch that one cannot scratch
